''Full support it is available in 5.5.0-rc kernel'' |windriv = '''Win 10''' (64-bit) |is_manuf = No |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |addchip = |flags = Wi-Fi 6, WPA3, 1024QAM, HE160, VHT160, DFS (slave), Bluetooth 5.0 |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac+ax |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 03/05/2019 |estreldate = 04/03/2019 |price = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |country = |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== {{FCC ST|08/31/2019|indexme.}} {{See also|List of 802.11ax Hardware#Wireless adapters}} *[https://www.snbforums.com/threads/intel-mentions-intel-wi-fi-6-ax200-cyclone-peak-2-and-ax201-harrison-peak-2-network-adapters.49206/ ''Intel mentions Intel Wi-Fi 6 AX200 (Cyclone Peak 2) and AX201
(Harrison Peak 2) network adapters'' on '''SNB''' forums] The Test Report JBP document says that the card was tested in an ''Extender Main and Card board'' :called "CRF CNVIO DB M2" which is "Used to have a functional EUT outside a PC or laptop." This suggests that the AX200 uses CNVio, like the AX201 is expected to, and may mean :that the card can only be used in systems with certain Intel CPUs. ==Links of Interest== *[https://ark.intel.com/content/www/us/en/ark/products/189347/intel-wi-fi-6-ax200.html Intel Ark Specs] ==See also== :;[[Intel Wi-Fi 6 AX series]] • [[Intel]] *[[Intel Wi-Fi 6 AX200 (AX200NGW)]] • ''Cyclone Peak 2'' *[[Rivet Networks Killer Wireless-AX 1650x (200NGW)]] *[[Intel Wi-Fi 6 AX200 (AX200D2WL)]] • ''Cyclone Peak 2'' *[[Rivet Networks Killer Wireless-AX 1650w (200D2W)]] *[[Intel Wi-Fi 6 AX201 (AX201NGW)]] • ''Harrison Peak 2'' *[[Rivet Networks Killer Wireless-AX 1650i (201NGW)]] *[[Intel Wi-Fi 6 AX201 (AX201D2W)]] • ''Harrison Peak 2'' *[[Rivet Networks Killer Wireless-AX 1650s (201D2W)]] *[[Intel Wi-Fi 6 AX201 (AX201D2WL)]] • ''Harrison Peak 2'' *[[Intel Wi-Fi 6E AX210 (AX210NGW)]] • ''Typhoon Peak'' *[[Intel® Killer™ Wi-Fi 6E AX1675 (210NGW)]] • ''Typhoon Peak'' *[[Intel Wi-Fi 6E AX210 (AX210D2W)]] • ''Typhoon Peak'' *[[Intel Wi-Fi 7 AX211 (AX211NGW)]] *[[Intel Wi-Fi 7 AX411 (AX411NGW)]] [[Category:English Documentation]]
